text: Looks great! Feel free to open issues about various API improvements you would want to Pkg so we can make those solid and tested, so we're not risking breaking this with various Pkg refactorings.

text:
That’s really nice to hear, thanks!

So far, everything has been easy to do with Pkg internals, so my requests would mostly be about making API public
